text: Niclas Füllkrug (born 9 February 1993) is a German football player. He plays as a forward for Borussia Dortmund and the Germany national team. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League DFB-Pokal Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Werder Bremen II 2011–12 3.
